name: All the Bright Places
description: The story of Violet and Theodore, who meet and change each other's lives forever. As they struggle with the emotional and physical scars of their past, they discover that even the smallest places and moments can mean something.

review.author: laurasomia
review.heading: A deeply sad but incomplete film.
review.reviewBody: This film tries to portray mental health in a realistic way and manages to do so to some extent. Some of the characters felt out of place and their arcs weren't developed enough, in my opinion. It is clear as you watch the film that was made after a book.

keywords: based on novel,mental illness,young adult,interracial relationship,suicide
